overview:
Aditya Deorha is currently in his final year of pursuing B.Tech in Electrical Engineering and M.Tech in Information and Communication Technology, from IIT Delhi. He is aiming to build an ecosystem, along with his two supervisors, where designers, engineers, IP vendors can come together to create indigenous micro-processors. One of his supervisors is from SUN Microsystems.

His Master’s thesis is titled, “Network Intrusion Detection and Prevention System (NIDPS) using OpenSPARC code base.” He attempts to create an NIDPS using a single standalone chip, using OpenSPARC processor and Network Interface Unit as its co-processor.

He is a blogger and blogs about both technical and random articles inspired from his personal experiences. He has been associated with organizations like National Association for the Blind.
